page.title: 09Playground Games
page.content: Among the games we play are: "Bulldog" The "catcher" stands in the middle of the playground while eveyone else stands against the end wall. The catcher chooses one person who has to cross the yard without being caught. If caught this person joins the catcher. If not caught, everyone else then crosses the yard, but anyone caught joins the catcher. The game continues until only one person has not been caught. "Chain Tig" One person is "it", and has to touch another person who also becomes "it". Each person caught joins hands with the catchers until a large chain is formed. The winner is the last person to be caught.
